title: Can't get connected to the server
body: So  since yesterday a few hours from afternoon I just can't  log-in and still trying today  with no chances , so ..  why ?  is NA server down  or what  and all of this happened after  I got disconnected from an ARAM match   . -.

replies.body:
I was able to log on all night, so this issue is likely on your end.

Have you tried testing it by disabling/adding league as an exception to your firewall? If that doesn't work, let me know and I will get back to you when I see your post.

Hey guys, I just wanted to chime in here to see if I can provide some assistance just like the excellent work being done by Pryotra!

So far, the initial diagnosis (I can still doctor lingo, right?) is largely correct.  An error such as this can occur due to an unstable connection, or a 3rd party security program that is blocking League of Legends.  

Before we go straight at the throat regarding connectivity issues, there are some troubleshooting steps I would like you to try:

1. Ensure your Windows Clock is synced - https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20201443-syncing-windows-clock

1. Make sure that your IE settings are configured properly (while it may seem odd, IE is a dependency for the League of Legends Client) - https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21931765-Windows-Settings-Troubleshooting

1. Confirm that your IE is not in "offline" mode.  You can check this by opening the taskbar in IE, clicking on "File", and making sure Offline Mode is not checked.

I hope this helps!
